title: My phone continuously restarts in loop, not even making it to the G before restarting again
content: I have tried to factory reset my device to completely wipe it clean in hopes that it would solve the problem, but before I can completer the reset, my phone restarts again. I also left it overnight in hopes that letting the battery drain would "fix" it, but the moment I plugged the phone in, it began restarting again.
